actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to restrain the Nation's fuel consumption rate by providing for the lowering of the maximum speed limit within each State.

summary.text: Provides for the lowering of the maximum speed limit within each State in order to conserve fuel. Prohibits Federal aid for highways to any State which does not have a maximum speed limit of 55 miles per hour or less.

titles.title: A bill to restrain the Nation's fuel consumption rate by providing for the lowering of the maximum speed limit within each State.
